title: Ukraine’s Zelensky Urges Global Businesses to Exit Russia in Speech to Congress
sub_head: Companies have cited reasons from humanitarian to contractual arrangements for staying in Russia
body:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is taking aim at international companies that continue to operate in Russia, adding pressure on executives grappling with how to respond to Moscow’s invasion of Ukraine.
Speaking to Congress on Wednesday, Mr. Zelensky asked lawmakers to encourage companies from their home states to stop doing business in Russia. He also called on the U.S. to ban the import of all Russian goods.
